steps: step 2: Click on link 'Phone' -> Navigate to page 'category/phone'
step 3: Click on link 'iPhone 15' -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
step 6: Click on link 'Place an order'
step 7: Proceed to checkout after providing email and shipping info
step 8: Enter shipping details and continue to payment
step 9: Click on input field 'payment method id'
step 10: Click on button 'COMPLETE ORDER' -> Navigate to page 'thank-you/*'
step 11: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
